citation: Cal. Bus. & Prof. Code ยง 17200
title: Unfair Competition Law
text: California's Unfair Competition Law prohibits unfair or fraudulent business acts or practices.

title: Consumer Legal Remedies Act
text: The Consumer Legal Remedies Act prohibits specific unfair methods of competition and unfair or deceptive acts or practices.

question: What are some examples of unfair business practices?
answer: Examples of unfair business practices include false advertising, bait-and-switch tactics, and misleading pricing.

question: What can I do if I've been the victim of an unfair business practice?
answer: If you've been the victim of an unfair business practice, you can file a complaint with the appropriate agencies and consult with an attorney.

question: I think a company is falsely advertising their product.  What can I do?
